Tangram_ReleaseData_C01_DOOR_MIDO_FIRST_.speaker: UI
Tangram_ReleaseData_C01_DOOR_MIDO_FIRST_.text: A mechanism for opening the door to the Heavens.

Tangram_ReleaseData_W01Mirror_Explanatio.speaker: UI
Tangram_ReleaseData_W01Mirror_Explanatio.text: A shattered mirror in Sequoia Mall. Ghosts are said to appear from it, because of course they do.

Tangram_ReleaseData_W01Shikifuda_Explana.speaker: UI
Tangram_ReleaseData_W01Shikifuda_Explana.text: A talisman thought to be the eastern barrier. It's kept in a shrine on the roof of Sequoia Mall.

Tangram_ReleaseDara_W01Jizo_Explanation.speaker: UI
Tangram_ReleaseDara_W01Jizo_Explanation.text: The design of the Jizo at Komainu Jizo Children's Park is thought to be the western barrier.

Tangram_ReleaseData_W02StoryQuestYELExpl.speaker: UI
Tangram_ReleaseData_W02StoryQuestYELExpl.text: A compass that guides the Dusk Pinwheel.

Tangram_ReleaseData_W02_MIRROR_Explanati.speaker: UI
Tangram_ReleaseData_W02_MIRROR_Explanati.text: A mirror located in an ancient castle. It was previously used as a way to keep someone—or something—sealed away.

Tangram_ReleaseData_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDU.speaker: UI
Tangram_ReleaseData_W02_EVAR_MIDO_AQUEDU.text: A magical panel that controls the flow of the Black Witch's canal.

Tangram_ReleaseData_W03Castle_Explanatio.speaker: UI
Tangram_ReleaseData_W03Castle_Explanatio.text: A castle gate sealed by a desire most frightening.
